reviews.title: Child safe portable fan
reviews.review_text: I ordered this product to cool and entertain my three year old son. The fan works well for only having one battery and it is safe to the touch with no pain. My favorite thing about the product is the portable design with foam blades. This is perfect for my intended purpose.

reviews.title: Works fantastically!!!
reviews.review_text: It's compact to keep in my purse. I have one in my car. Another in the house. Came with a battery. Always a plus. I use it inside and outside. My little dog was hot one day and I used it to cool her down, too. Works very well. And I like the rubber blades for safety.

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.review_text: Cute- nice small size so convenient to carry to summer games, practices etc. Got one for each of my grandkids to use while they watch their siblings play in games. They love them! Easy to operate. Gives a nice little breeze and even comes with a battery. Safe as small fingers won't get hurt if they accidentally touch the fan blades. Might be nice to have for ‚Äú hot flashes‚Äù too lol

These little fans are awesome. I keep one in each purse, each car, %26 in almost every room in our house, I have problems with hot flashes so I need them all the time. It's easy to replace the battery so they last a long time.

reviews.title: Small portable battery operated fan
reviews.review_text: The fan works great with only one battery. Safe for kids and small enough to take in your purse or diaper bag. My favorite thing about the fan is the soft foam fan blades.

reviews.title: Coolest cooling fan
reviews.review_text: I live in hot and humid place and the temperature can go up to 90. But I need to do my regular walk daily. I tried using different fan while walking but it's either too big or much energy consuming. This tiny fan is easy to carry and though tiny it serves it's purpose of cooling. It consumes less energy. I've been using it for 1 week daily, 1-2 hr per day and single battery is serving its purpose. I bet this single battery will last long. The on/off switch was little tight in the beginning but it has loosen up with use and now easy to glide. This thing has soft plastic blades and it won't hurt you even if you stop it with your hand. I don't mean put your hand in to stop it but what I meant is there is no fear of injury, hence can be used even by toddlers. And, no you don't have to add water or double battery in this. Just buy it, put in single battery and there is on off gliding switch and cool off .... easy!!

reviews.title: Perfect for hot summer days
reviews.review_text: When your a baseball mom sitting out in the hot heat during the games can be pretty rough. This little fan is perfect! I wasn‚Äôt expecting much out of it since it was so small but I was pleasantly surprised. It fans really well and helps keep me cool. Comes with a clip as well so I can attach it to my purse so it‚Äôs never lost. Will definitely get a second one so my son can use one in the dugout during his games.

reviews.title: O2COOL Pocket Carabiner Fan
reviews.review_text: O2COOL Pocket Carabiner Fan with Batteries, it takes one AA battery that is easy to replace when needed. The fan is very light weight. Close to five inches long and 1 1/2 inches wide by 1 1/2 inches deep. The complete rotating fan is three inches. The blades are made of foam and will stop if you touch anything with it, but hair can get tangled around the fan blades shaft. The fan blade assembly is removable from the shaft and slides right back on. They come in a variety of colors. It comes with a carabiner to hook on anything you want so you do not have to carry it and so it will be handy. A slide on and off button, stays on you do not have to hold it on. It does put out a nice blast of air. Found it usefull at a gym, in a stuffy store and I know someone who loves it for hot flashes.

reviews.title: O 2 Tiny
reviews.review_text: The 02COOL fan is made well and very sturdy. I love the clip on feature. It's powered by 1 AA battery. The fan blade itself is made of thin plastic it's not for me, probably great for someone that doesn't really get hot. I have hot flashes so it doesn't work for me. If you're in an AC controlled room it's perfect but outside in the heat it would not do the job.

If I could put no stars I would, it doesn't work, you have to flick it to get it spinning and there's absolutely no breeze that's coming off it. But it's cute n compact with a clip if it worked it would have been great !

reviews.title: It's a fan
reviews.review_text: They are cute and come with a battery. There is not a lot of power behind them so it doesn't do much to help cool you down. But it's ok for $3-4
The fan is handy convenient when I don't want a lot of cold air but just need to cool off a bit due to hot flashes

reviews.title: junk
reviews.review_text: As expensive as it is it has very little cooling power. It seems like a useless gadget. I got this from the spark reviewer to test.I truly would not recommend this product.

reviews.title: Bad changes
reviews.review_text: These are not as good as the original O2Cool, they only use one AA battery instead of two so the are not as strong. Bad move, messing with something there was nothing wrong with. I wont buy these again.

reviews.title: O2cool pocket fan
reviews.review_text: I like that this is small. It has a vibrant primary green happy color. However, I do wish it were smaller and lighter with more power output, but most of all, quieter would be a real plus as well. It would also be great if it were made from recycled plastic too.

reviews.title: No
reviews.review_text: You'll be able to feel this fan if you hold it half an inch from your face. At that point, however, it will start thwapping your hair or glasses or nose if you move even slightly. It does have cute, soft little silicone blade-flaps, so it's safer than many models, but that also means it doesn't do much.

reviews.title: Small Personal Fans
reviews.review_text: Thought it's smaller but still good travel size. Material seems good and like the clip for easy carry. Fan blade is foam materials so safe to use, especially for small kids. Surprisingly good speed and cooling effect. So far it's an awesome product, will probably order more. Don't know how long battery life is, but make sure to remove safety paper inside before first use. I kept mine to save the battery life, but I don't know how well that works lol.

reviews.title: really really sm not much cooling going on
reviews.review_text: only good if thats all you have to keep cool
Good little fan, has enough power to keep you cool for sometime during a hot summer day.
I have bought this product in the past and love that it uses a battery and not a rechargeable fan
wonderful for hot flashes and to carry on an airplane

reviews.title: Very weak
reviews.review_text: These really aren't powerful enough. I think a fly could blow more air by flying by you.

reviews.title: we love it!
reviews.review_text: is still going strong with daily use. such a nice product we love it.

reviews.title: For Nico Grigg
reviews.review_text: Little under power but cheap for this would recommend

reviews.title: Not worth it.
reviews.review_text: worked good at first but stopped working within a day

reviews.title: Safe to keep in pocket
reviews.review_text: This little fan is a good companion when hot or stuffy. It's palm-sized, so just right for pockets. It has soft rubber blades, so it won't break in the pocket or hurt fingers or noses if you get too close while it's spinning. I only gave it 4 stars because it doesn't blow hard enough to really cool, like an electric fan. But for a pocket fan it works great. In a stuffy car or shopping in a warm store, it does the job.

reviews.title: Perfect Pocket Size!
reviews.review_text: This is a great little fan. Perfect size for our little lady hands. I currently use this to help my toner and setting spray dry down when applying my makeup. Will absolutely be throwing it in my bag for the summer months. Pretty durable and made with quality products.

reviews.title: Designed well
reviews.review_text: Obviously not very powerful but designed well. Has an angled head that directs the air flow to your face. A nice touch is that the the battery is included and it only takes one. Includes a clip. It can be locked into position for a continuous air flow or held for short bursts. It's hot now in Arizona so it makes things a little more comfortable. Nice.

reviews.title: Sensational Personal Fan!
reviews.review_text: The O2COOL Pocket Carabiner Fan with batteries is terrific! Instant cooling air on a hot day and much more effective in cooling off your face in these COVID days of wearing a mask. Small enough to carry in your purse or backpack, or clip onto your belt or belt loop using the handy clip. Another bonus, it's QUIET! A great product from the aptly named O2COOL Company! I'm already thinking about buying these for Christmas stocking stuffers!

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.review_text: It stopped working after two days. I'm not sure if it was the battery or what.

reviews.title: ok
reviews.review_text: cool as a toy to play with but doesn't move much air

reviews.title: not that strong
reviews.review_text: so based on the size of this i wasn't expecting it to be really strong however it was worse than i expected it to be. it almost blows no air at all and you have to put it REALLY CLOSE to your face to feel anything
Nice and small. Worked great for the music festival I went to. Only downside was the cheap plastic carabiner is prone to failure. Not a big issue for me though.

reviews.title: Arrived broken, couldn't use
reviews.review_text: They sent me a broken fan. Half of the fan blade was ripped off! So it was unusable. If wasn't in a bag or anything either. Thankfully Walmart gave me a refund, I had a picture but I don't know where it is.

reviews.title: It's not worth the money.
reviews.review_text: it worked for a little while it barely blows any air. then it hust started reversing the little air that was blowing, now i turn it on and I feel nothing. bot even a little breeze. zero ziltch nothing!!!!
It was exactly what I was looking for. I needed a little fan to carry around with me on campus and its perfect size and works great. It was also on sale so it was priced well.

reviews.title: personal fan
reviews.review_text: This fan is exactly how it's pictured and described online.I would say it's reasonably priced for what you get. I think it's handy for hot days, if you're at the beach or a park.

reviews.title: Very strong
reviews.review_text: Honestly this provides a better breeze than some of the cheap desk fans you buy and it has a clip so you can hang it somewhere if you want to. Got it free with Walmart cash and it was for sure worth it

reviews.title: Arrived broken
reviews.review_text: One fan will only turn on %26 not off. Walmart requires a return of the item for refund. We're on vacation at Disney, not worth the hassle. I will purchase fans elsewhere.

reviews.title: great little fan for the price
reviews.review_text: i didn't expect much considering how inexpensive it was and came with a battery. it's blows a decent amount of air! i love the portable small purse size.
Works, not sure how durable it will be but you can't beat the price.
Product is exactly as described. Arrived so fast I could hardly believe it!

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: Brandon did a wonderful job bringing to my window! Give him a raise üëÜüòÉ
Item worked real good and did the job I expected it to do.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: No impressive in the slightest, I work at Walmart and our store is hot, bought this until my fan for my register comes in and we'll after day one of use I'm ready to return or trash it. Not sure if the batteries are working or the fan is just weak, it worked great at first but after a few hours (non-constant use) it was no longer putting out much air.

reviews.title: 02COOL is so COOL!
reviews.review_text: I didn't know what to expect but started using the fan right out of the package! It's light weight, easy to carry in purse, on belt loops or on keyring. Amazing how much breeze this little fella' puts out. I live in Texas where one can Always use a breeze. This would make a great little gift or stocking stuffer.

reviews.title: Good item, runs well with a battery included
reviews.review_text: Okay I was amazed immediately that it came with a battery, one single AA. The unit is easy to operate although the switch being made to be ion line with the body of the fan could be hard to operate for those with less dexterity. It runs and gives a nice cool breeze. It comes with a little plastic clip to hang on a belt, bag, etc. What else is there to say, it does what it says it should.

reviews.title: Small, portable fan that brings refreshment!
reviews.review_text: This O2COOL brand pocket sized fan with carabiner is a nice, portable size and comes in fun bright colors. It comes with the battery included, so it is ready to use right out of the package. The small size makes it very light weight and makes it fit perfectly in the palm of my hand and easy to take along anywhere I go. Having a small sized fan with me during these hotter months is great! I get to cool down while out and about, while going on walks, sitting by the lake, at barbecues or even in the car. The carabiner is nice to have to hang this portable fan on the belt loops of my pants or to attach it to my purse or backpack when hiking with my family. This pocket fan works just as expected and I recommend it!

reviews.title: Fan
reviews.review_text: I like that you can clip it to your belt loop. It is easy to use. The fan puts out a lot of air when it is turned on. With it being small and able to hold in your hand. You could take it with you when you are outside going for a walk or a run and while sitting at the beach watching the children playing in the sand or while playing in the water. You could also use it while you are in the parent pick up line at school waiting in your car for the children to get out of school.

reviews.title: never recieved
reviews.review_text: this item was not delivered to me. my other items were delivered, but the fan was not with the rest of my order.

reviews.title: personal fan
reviews.review_text: This is not worth the few bucks. it barely blows any air and it almost has to be right next to your skin to feel anything

reviews.title: Compact Travel Fan
reviews.review_text: I have purchased these before and they were fine, but this time when I removed the wrapper, they did not work. A bit disappointed.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: For a little fan it's actually pretty powerful. We're taking it with us to California this July while we go to amusement parks so hopefully it helps.

reviews.title: Pitiful
reviews.review_text: What a pitiful excuse for a fan. easy to use but with only two props, it does not put out the air to cool anything off. another huge waste of money.

reviews.title: Excellent hand-held fan
reviews.review_text: I like this fan because it is lightweight, operates on a battery, and the blades are foam, but spin quickly to provide cooling. It is light enough that I carry it in my handbag. I have another one that I got at Walmart many years ago and it is still working great, but I wanted to get a second one in case a friend swipes my original one.

reviews.title: Convenient fan.
reviews.review_text: I always buy these and I love it! This one was a gift for a friend. This summer is gonna be a scorcher so this fan is going to be very convenient for any hot situation. It does not take up a lot of room in your purse. You can add it to your house key and it makes it easy to find it in your pocketbook...It is very convenient! üíïüíïüíïüíïüíïüíïüíï‚ÄºÔ∏è

reviews.title: What breeze?
reviews.review_text: This fan barely has any air moving. I bought it on a whim this summer and what a waste of a few dollars. Would not purchase again. If you want a fan a piece of paper would move more air than this fan. I never leave bad reviews but wanted to give someone honest feedback.

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.review_text: I bought 6 for me and my kids. We went to my Nephew's baseball game. All my sister's used them too because it was hot. We had them 70% on the whole time, 3 or more hour game, and none has run out of the AA battery yet. Ill just carry some batteries in my purse next time in case they dont make it 2 rounds of a long game. They're good little fans as long as you put them a fiot or less from your body or face. love!

reviews.title: good little fan for hot days and crowded places
reviews.review_text: Small sturdy compact fan - design is curved so it fits easy in your hand. Gives a decent amount of air for the size of the fan. Well Made...not cheap plastic like you might get at dollar store. Would have preferred it have a strap to keep on your hand. Ideal usage is to hold 5 inches from body to get good air flow. On/off button is a little hard to press but loosens up over time. Comes with battery and a hook to put on your purse or back pack. Battery easily replaceable by just sliding out the back.

reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!
reviews.review_text: Perfect for what I wanted! Came with a battery already installed and ready to use. (Just remove the little tab to start.) I wear this fan on a lanyard around my neck at work, so the carabiner comes in handy. Wearing a mask at work tends to fog up my glasses, but I just turn on my little fan and problem solved. I have a couple of these fans because I tend to get warm easily, and I love them. The blades are soft, too, so no chance of accidental injury. I would purchase this again. Recommended!!!
Perfect affordable fan for Kids during vacation/Hot Summer Day
Light weight but not good for outside heat. Battery life isn't long either.

reviews.title: Handy for camping
reviews.review_text: These are great for camping and for kids and teens!

reviews.review_text: This has been great for both myself and my 5 yr old during walks on hot days.
its cute and handy and it's small but strong would recommend

reviews.title: Not worth it for me
reviews.review_text: Opened the package and put the batteries in. Set aside the fan to use the following morning. The batteries it came with exploded overnight and now the fan won't work at all even with different batteries.
I had an excellent experience with my delivery order! It came right on time, I was notified right away of any changes and provided tracking information to follow my order right to my door!
Used for our zoo trip and was a life saver! Got one for everyone in the family and my toddler used it the whole 7 hours we were there. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Lightweight and cool fans
reviews.review_text: My husband is in a wheelchair, and we go for walks a lot. We hung them around our necks, leaving our hands free. We just used a string and hung it from the hook on the fan. The fans did keep us cool successfully.

reviews.title: Great little Cooler
reviews.review_text: Small %26 Compact little fan to carry in my purse for summer activities. Example baseball games when you need some extra cooling. I am always warm, so I use it alot !!

reviews.title: Nice breeze!
reviews.review_text: This little fan is so handy to have around! Great for camping or watching kids sports. It is extremely sturdy and puts out an impressive flow of air! I received this product to review and it is a good one, I‚Äôd recommend this fan.

reviews.title: Nice personal air flow
reviews.review_text: It's small but has good air flow. I like the clip so I can put it in a loop or hang it off of my purse until I need it. Hand grip is comfortable. Came with a battery and only requires 1. I would buy more.

reviews.title: Handy and lightweight
reviews.review_text: I received a pretty pink color perfect for my 2 year old daughter. Its is handy and lightweight. Operates on a single battery, has only one speed. The body is plastic and the blades are made of styrofoam. It's safe for kids even though they accidentally happen to touch it when on. It works well from a 2 feet distance. It also has a latch to hook it by the stroller or bag.

reviews.title: Came with Batteries

reviews.title: Loved these personal fans for vacation
reviews.review_text: Loved the ease and portability of it to take on vacation. Fairly good air circulation for something so small.

very small but powerful may need to purchase extra batteries
